citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
A current Program of Veterinary care was not available for review. The Program of Veterinary care had not been updated
to include the new Attending Veterinarians' information, who had taken on the role in 2022. The PVC must be kept
current and available for review during inspections. The facility must correct this issue.
*********Correct by May 1, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.33(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care. 
A current Program of Veterinary care was not available for review. The Program of Veterinary care had not been updated 
to include the new Attending Veterinarians' information,  who had taken on the role in 2022. The PVC must be kept 
current and available for review during inspections. The facility must correct this issue. 
*********Correct by May 1, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
